GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /endpoint.description: what you can expect to recieve from the endpoint

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object article requested by article id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

comments.body: The owls are not what they seem.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts comment to given article_id and returns the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Will increment or decrement the votes based on the number passed on the object in the body. Responds with updated article

DELETE /api/comments/notanumber.description: Will delete the comment corresponding to the comment_id given. Will not respond with any content
